Module com.electra.canbusdemo
Package com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus

Class CANbus_Driver

java.lang.Object
com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus.CANbus_Driver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Driver
public class CANbus_Driver extends Object implements Driver
This Class implements an abstraction layer that allows to send/receive bytes to/from the connected devices via CANbus.

This file contains the implementation of CANbus driver.

Property: E-Lectra s.r.l.
